law.text: To the extent that State funds become available and subject to the procedures in § 11-505(d) of this subtitle, after receiving recommendations from the Governor's Workforce Investment Board regarding the utilization of State funds to supplement federal funds for employment and training services, supportive services, and for related services such as training allowances and stipends, the Governor may allocate an amount for such purposes in accordance with State budget procedures.
